item.description: Table of Contents Let’s go hacking Not quite there yet! Gimme the code! In this post I am going to plug about a cool trick(probably useless) that I discovered geeking around the internet. I was building a tiny microservice which would let the client side application securely authenticate with GitHub. After writing the only required API, I wanted to render the README.
